item.title: Report E-2024090078
item.description:
Report E-2024090078

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-08T09:12:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-05
  • City: PLAINFIELD
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that due to a nail puncture, approximately 1-gallon of Hydrochloric Acid 9% (hazardous - UN1789) was released. The caller stated that the released product was contained to the trailer floor. The terminal advised they already cleaned and contained the release. The released product, damaged pail, and oil-dri was placed into a 20-gallon poly drum and staged in OS&D. There were no drains, soils or waterways reported to have been impacted by the release.
